file_content.text: The mark of the Ravagers. Bloodiest, meanest crew of killers in the Rim.
Used to be my crew. Had some class, when I was running things. Even let people surrender sometimes.
Your crew? You were their captain?
Yeah, till I took a blade in the back. Few other places, too. Can thank my second-in-command for that.
Coratanni. She calls herself captain, now--hah! "Kill everyone, steal everything." Real complex strategy, there.
What I wouldn't do to get my crew back from her backstabbing hands....
Would you go legit?
Huh? What are you talking about?
I help you get your crew back, you all become privateers for the Republic. What do you say?
I say aye! Better a captain for you than nothing at all.
They run junkers to our old hideout all the time. You can stow away on one and nobody will be the wiser.
I know that place like the back... hm. What I mean is, I can talk you through once you're inside.
Just be sure you take some friends along--the Ravagers didn't earn their reputation for nothing, and Coratanni's the toughest of them all.
Revenge will be sweet....
Ah, that takes me back.
The Ravagers. Terrors of sea and sky. They got a motto: "Why leave 'em alive when you can kill 'em?" Not the cleverest, granted, but it is appropriate.
Are you talking to me?
Seen you around here. Seen what you can do. I got a proposal, like.
Used to be the Ravagers' captain till I got double-crossed by my first mate. Coratanni. Cut me up good, left me for dead. Took my hand for a trophy.
She doesn't deserve to call herself captain. Sure, she stuck one into my back okay, but she doesn't know from killing or looting--not like me.
So what do you propose?
Get rid of Coratanni. Get me my crew back. Do that, and the Empire's got itself a major player on Rishi.
Ravagers got a nice little hideout. It's remote, hard to get to, but they make junk runs all the time. Stow away on a scow and you're in.
That sounds easy enough.
Might want to take some, ah, associates with you. Even with Coratanni at the helm, the Ravagers ain't nothing to mess with.
I'll keep in touch along the way. Lend you a hand, so to speak.
Haha... revenge, revenge, revenge. Here it comes, Cora....
